EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder - AECOM at the Serpentine Gallery Pavilion
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Reminder - AECOM at the Serpentine Gallery Pavilion
We recently sent you an invitation to join us for an evening of drinks and canap√©s to celebrate the opening of this year's Serpentine Gallery Pavilion.
We don't appear to have heard from you yet, but we do hope you can join us.
To RSVP, please email or telephone us using the details below:
On: Wednesday 16 July, 18.30-22.30
At: Serpentine Gallery, Kensington Gardens, London W2 3XA
RSVP
E: RSVPserpentine.europe@aecom.com T: +44 (0)20 7645 2017
